com.tofik.coolexoplayer.exoplayer

Class ExoPlayerDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.DefaultControlDispatcher
      • com.tofik.coolexoplayer.exoplayer.ExoPlayerDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ControlDispatcher

    public class ExoPlayerDispatcher
extends com.google.android.exoplayer2.DefaultControlDispatcher
    Since:
    3.6.0.2802 Work with PressablePlayerSelector and PlayerView to handle user's custom playback interaction. A common use-case is when user clicks the Play button to manually start a playback. We should respect this by putting the CoolPlayer's priority to highest, and request a refresh for all CoolPlayer. The same behaviour should be handled for the case user clicks the Pause button. All behaviour should be cleared once user scroll the selection out of playable region. This is already handled by PressablePlayerSelector.
